text: i am a year old student in korea and i am stressed overwhelmingly by academics and the sat

one of my friends lost his brother to suicide years ago and has still not completely dealt withgotten over i hate using that term with reference to someonesomething that has died it my depression has become significantly increased in thei think my depression has made me feel dependent on people and frankly im tired of it
i finally did it i just passed my graduation exam got my driver license and dad told me i can drive his car if i need to i am happy
i am depressed again but to depressed to do anything about it
finished my first paint by number love how it turned out

listening to my favorite music as i wait for darkness to see and photograph saturn as someone who struggled to make rent for years im so thankful and grateful for my life and this feeling of happiness
